transcript:
Hello?
Hello? Hello?
Hello? Hello, haan ji?
Am I speaking to Mr. Deen Malik?
Yes, who is this?
Sir, I'm Richa speaking from IndiaMART head office. How are you?
Yes, yes.
Uh, will you please arrange, will you make a call arrange for tomorrow?
Uh, right now I'm driving.
Alright, sir. Thank you.
